node.code:
return unless exists($HTMLVARS{'group_gods'}{$$USER{node_id}}) || exists($HTMLVARS{'group_content editors'}{$$USER{node_id}});
htmlcode('openform').'<fieldset><legend>Add node forward</legend> <input type="hidden" name="op" value="new"> <input type="hidden" name="type" value="node_forward"> <input type="hidden" name="node" id="new_node_title" value="'.$$NODE{title}.'"> <label>Forward node to: <input type="text" name="forward_to_node"></label> <input type="submit" value="Add forward"> </fieldset> </form>';
node.title: addnodeforward
